summary:
Adds a new armor set and weapon + npc's.
Search for the Servants of Molag Bal, and claim his treasure.
A whole new armor set based on molag bal.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/rocaXJX.png[/img][/center][center][/center][center]
--------------------------------------------------
[size=5][color=#ffff00][i]Adds :[/i][/color]
- Knight of Molag Bal Helmet
- Knight of Molag Bal Boots
- Knight of Molag Bal Gloves
- Knight of Molag Bal Cuirass
- Knight of Molag Bal Sword 1h

- Servants of Molag Bal NPC 5x
- Molag Key
- Treasures of Molag Bal Room[/size]

[size=4]EFFECTS ARMOR AND WEAPONS :[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/aghC6Ch.png[/img]
--------------------------------------------------
[size=4]How?
- Go to these locations to find the Servants of Molag Bal.
- - OROTHEIM
- - SAARTHAL
- - DARKLIGHT TOWER
- - FORSAKEN CAVE
- - FORT DUNSTADT
- Kill the servants to get the five keys.
- Go to The Treasures of Molag Bal and unlock the five chests.
- Loot the chests for the items.
- Male And Female mesh are the same.[/size]
--------------------------------------------------
Thx to :
- Bethesda
- Skyrim
- Creation Kit
- Blender
- Photoshop
- Nifskope

Sry for the bad english.
